text.0: indra and viṣṇu at my tasks completion i urge you on with food and sacred service.
text.1: accept the sacrifice and grant us riches leading us on by unobstructed pathways.
text.2: ye who inspire all hymns indra and viṣṇu ye vessels who contain the soma juices.
text.3: may hymns of praise that now are sung address you the lauds that are recited by the singers.
text.4: lords of joygiving draughts indra and viṣṇu come giving gifts of treasure to the soma.
text.5: with brilliant rays of hymns let chanted praises repeated with the lauds adorn and deck you.
text.6: may your foeconquering horses bring you hither indra and viṣṇu sharers of the banquet.
text.7: of all our hymns accept the invocations list to my prayers and hear the songs i sing you.
text.8: this your deed indraviṣṇu must be lauded widely ye strode in the wild joy of soma.
text.9: ye made the firmament of larger compass and made the regions broad for our existence.
text.10: strengthened with sacred offerings indraviṣṇu first eaters served with worship ana oblation.
text.11: fed with the holy oil vouchsafe us riches ye are the lake the vat that holds the soma.
text.12: drink of this meath o indra thou and viṣṇu drink ye your fill of soma wonderworkers.
text.13: the sweet exhilarating juice hath reached you hear ye my prayers give ear unto my calling.
text.14: ye twain have conquered neer have yc been conquered never hath either of the twain been vanquished.
text.15: ye indraviṣṇu when ye fought the battle produced this infinite with three divisions.
